mainEntity.name: How is take-home pay calculated in the USA?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our USA Salary Calculator deducts federal & state taxes, FICA contributions (Social Security and Medicare), and optional deductions to show your net take-home pay. Calculations follow current IRS guidelines and include progressive tax brackets.

mainEntity.name: What is the difference between 1099 and W2 contractor income?

acceptedAnswer.text: 1099 contractors are self-employed and responsible for their own taxes, including self-employment tax. W2 employees have taxes withheld by their employer. Our Contractor Salary Calculator helps compare the net income differences between these arrangements.

mainEntity.name: How does overtime pay work in the USA?

acceptedAnswer.text: Under FLSA rules, non-exempt employees must receive 1.5x their regular rate for hours worked over 40 in a workweek. Some states require higher rates. Our Overtime Pay Calculator factors in federal and state-specific overtime requirements.
